cobblemon.stat.defence.name: Defence
cobblemon.stat.special_defence.name: Special Defence
cobblemon.move.upperhand.desc: The user reacts to the target's movement and strikes with the heel of its palm, making the target flinch. This move fails if the target is not readying a priority move.
item.cobblemon.blue_mint_leaf.tooltip: Capable of influencing a Pokémon's defence stat
item.cobblemon.pink_mint_leaf.tooltip: Capable of influencing a Pokémon's special defence stat
